column1: Visitation will be 9:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.
column4: 2015 at the Collinsville Dolton Funeral Home.  Funeral Services will be 10:00 a.m. Friday
column6: 2015 at the Collinsville Dolton Funeral Home Chapel with Rev. Rodney Goodsell officiating. Interment will follow at the Ridgelawn Cemetery. Services are under the direction of Collinsville Dolton Funeral Home.
